verses.name: Job 30:17
verses.text: My bones are pierced in me in the night season: and my sinews take no rest.

verses.name: Job 30:18
verses.text: By the great force of my disease is my garment changed: it bindeth me about as the collar of my coat.

verses.name: Job 30:19
verses.text: He hath cast me into the mire, and I am become like dust and ashes.

verses.name: Job 30:20
verses.text: I cry unto thee, and thou dost not hear me: I stand up, and thou regardest me not.

verses.name: Job 30:21
verses.text: Thou art become cruel to me: with thy strong hand thou opposest thyself against me.
